Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: courtaf
Reviews.Content: street corot hotel right line doors main train station termini roma great location us since would taking leonardo express airport next morning train station like mall shops surprisingly good food check many hotels area chose one tripadvisor reviews free buffet breakfast free wifi december 1st definitely wasnt noisy didnt worry air conditioning since cold outside hotel personnel kind helpful even opened breakfast buffet early us since leave early airport kind room third floor big king bed twin bed refrigerator jacuzzi tub jets didnt work disappointing also lot english channels tv enjoyed stay one night

Reviews.Title: “friendly hotel in quiet area - small rooms though”
Reviews.Author: Richard271
Reviews.Content: hotel well located less walk termini main station hotel room clean spacious toilet pretty clean sure ill checkin corot hotel next trip rome

Reviews.Title: “'A Little Gem'”
Reviews.Author: noobutler
Reviews.Content: lets start positives hotels location within 2 min walk roma termini station negatives unfriendly staff switch rooms first night staff said room extra bed wanted accommodate family traveling arrived around 6pm friday would put us room said rooms occupied unlike states arguing rome take leave seem annoyed ask questions recommendations eat places see nearby guess hospitality something concerned ac switch room must call front desk turn front desk also turn ac around 730 morning without may still room expectations want place sleep bothered may okay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely little hotel and great value”
Reviews.Author: Wes_Charles
Reviews.Content: looking hotel close train metro station hotel across street station hotel room clean comfortable air conditioning demand front desk staff helpful breakfast good lady makes great area safe police place rome beautiful

Reviews.Title: “Charming Hotel, Peaceful Neighborhood, Warm Staff”

Reviews.Content: nice room service good clean room close central bus station lot shops room

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Geek2Go
Reviews.Content: place right across street termini location perfect get main tourist points little dingy clean overall size decent european standards thought breakfast service great loved machine helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Small, friendly and cosy hotel”
Reviews.Author: MMTMRome
Reviews.Content: location hotel one block roma train terminal 2030 minute walk hotel strange since every floor either hotel corot hotel would avoid hotel cost 13 day trip least favorite hotel due feeling staying hotel clean food ok service average

Reviews.Content: hotel walking distance main train station buses able find bus lines bought rome pass helpful get around places wanted go metro rooms spacious clean view street tons restaurants close good pricy food walk around six blocks find restaurant good one problem hotel airconditioning either strong strong enough controlled main control room

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Surveyor8785
Reviews.Content: stayed recently hotel corot rome situated railway station rome 2 lines hotel clean room service every day breakfasts quite good usual continental fare coffee machine bit hit miss waitress would always make fresh staff helpful quite decent hotel could start look little tired years

Reviews.Title: “Small and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: vincec
Reviews.Content: exit central station right one minute walk hotel ideal catching early train train airport convenient otherwise much much better elsewhere two men desk arrived rude surly one insisted cigarette helped us room bathroom clean small window opened onto air bed hard rock reasons hotel corot hotel get room

Reviews.Content: book hotel problem excellent location close termini station nice places eat anything fast reception employees nice triple bedroom ok found bathroom spacious clean dinner close restaurant il full locals good pasta wine would certainly stayed

Reviews.Author: SkovgaardMoeller
Reviews.Content: spent week hotel girlfriend first visit rome hotel located directly opposite termini station convenient access metro lines airport train room clean comfortable bathroom modern looked like recent refurbishment hotel offers free wifi service free easy access reception give access code breakfast included holiday good quality selection cold meats pastries fruit

Reviews.Content: got hotel last minute booking previous bb booked dangerous zone booked agent cost 20 hotel receptionist charge us hotel best walked train station cross road hotel corot service good room clean would go back hotel next trip

Reviews.Content: hotel close 100 metres main railway station rome termini noise minimal despite even 2nd floor although room room quite basic great need somewhere sleep although probably somewhere stay day clean quite reasonable staff friendly spoke good english wifi reason didnt reach use area breakfast good cold buffet staying rome would look else available think price hotel good value would consider staying

Reviews.Title: “A Home Away from Home”

Reviews.Content: excellent location walking distance train station restaurants room comfortable standard clean bathroom updated clean better expected small hotel fussy travellers

Reviews.Title: “excellent in every way”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed two nights hotel corot reason selected hotel close proximity train termini rome train make right station cross street walk less half block hotels front door arrived 8 morning room available hotel staff pleasant helped us bags small elevator 3rd floor room clean queen bed tv safe minibar hardwood floors large bathroom walkin shower toilet bidet sink hair dryer large fluffy towels plenty toiletries airconditioner early season large window room stayed comfortable quite abit noise street window closed didnt notice breakfast room nice choices eat great cereal eggs hard rolls fresh fruit cheese ham coffee tea would highly recommend hotel traveler like us staying couple extra days rome cruise convenient place stay rome main attractions close walking using type transportation felt safe wouldnt hesitate staying

Reviews.Title: “Great Location with Great Staff!”

Reviews.Content: hotel near termini station good connections public subway bus order cover major small entrance corot hotel sister hotel elevator small 2 people nice modern breakfast room breakfast buffet ham eggs cereals ask regular espresso good rooms small high without balcony smell old rooms bathrooms big renovated clean stayed 6 nights march 07 arrived raining chilly rooms go reception ask possible turning ac receptionist days later found owner agree beginning end ac room visited hotels central rome 4 hotels agree problems accommodation many hotels historical buildings renovated possibility balconies corot hotel offers decent accommodation nothing high expectation

Reviews.Title: “Great value, nice location and very friendly staff.”

Reviews.Content: recently stayed two friends triple room room spacious bathroom modern walls looked damp think needed cleaning breakfast hotel nice red orange juice gorgeous tea unfortunately wasnt nice probably water lift hold 3 people max thank goodness 2nd floor couldnt catch lift love money checking suitcase drag stairs staff helpful friendly booked us restaurant nice taxi location handy although middle think preferred get taxis everywhere people selling dodgy goods outside hotel honest never bothered us would recommend hotel price quality central location

Reviews.Title: “Great value with easy location”
Reviews.Author: UFPA10
Reviews.Content: partner stayed 4 nights hotel although said reviews surroundings little rough decided take chance glad hotel convenient location literally 1 minute walk termini main station connections parts rome great starting point explore city also main bus station next station open top city bus tours start area really touristy never spent much time station many modern shopping facilities many surrounding area dont like far hotel meal evening hotel right us luxurious clean comfortable rooms modern bathroom bath impressive shower unit must admit trying figure worked many different room cleaned daily high standard staff spoke good english polite friendly helpful arrival checked problems one staff took cases small lift said would meet us outside room walk third floor room us case met us showed us door opened lighting worked wished us pleasant stay safety deposit box room extra charge useful well stocked mini bar television news channel english find breakfast ample cereals fruit toast cheese meats yogurts tea coffee breakfast seating area pleasant leaving hotel asked reception could leave luggage due afternoon problem rome beautiful city even 4 nights long enough us recommended day city go visit fountain gardens pleasant memorable day would definately love go back rome would stay corot hotel without hesitation

Reviews.Content: boyfriend came back stay hotel corot last week hotel convenient traveling cities using termini station right outside termini train station definitely frills hotel hotel bit older elevator lift fits 2 people maximum rooms bathroom quite small got corner room 2nd floor view tv small secured corner making difficult watch said really enjoyed breakfast cappucino really good accompanied choice croissants toast cheese cereal basics

Reviews.Content: stayed corot three nights august along several family members sisters wedding hotel located close termini station staff hotel friendly helpful rooms small side fully air conditioned clean mini bar room nicely priced continental breakfast served morning 7am 10am range pastries rolls etc choose would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Warm and enjoyable stay in Paris”

Reviews.Content: hotel getting bit worn rooms ok bit small side 2 adults breakfast bad toast tea etc staff friendly polite big let hotel area termini full first trip rome stayed near american much better area rome well worth visit first

Reviews.Content: returned corot street termini handy staff friendly european sort clean small exactly three guys sharing room spent entire time sightseeing room little breakfast eat save money meals helpful finding way piece luggage late arriving rome staff helped etc made us feel next door quite handy also bus trains steps got expected neat clean cheap handy terminal

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights towards end italian trip ended vacation pretty okay note hotel located right next termini somewhat chaotic area may turn people chose reason wanting close station wouldnt miss early morning train airport worked fine quite hotels around area want budget hotel central convenient spot easy access public transportation couldnt wrong one hotel operated inside old building sharing space hotel room small bit dark facing peoples back windows otherwise furnished typical single room facilities standard size single traveller small functional breakfast served first floor right next hall ok selection coffee milk juice cereal yogurt pastries etc facilities would nice internet point right next hotel case people need front desk staff professional one female staff morning particularly friendly helpful good stay wouldnt mind recommending hotel anyone travels budget

Reviews.Title: “Great Service-Price-Value-Location !!”

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and good affordable place to stay - Nice Breakfast”

Reviews.Title: “Super Experience”
Reviews.Author: nyekasper
Reviews.Content: colleagues consistently stay hotel whenever paris meetings hotel within walking distance number major shops staff friendly helpful courteous always try accommodate guests rooms sizes wellappointed ensuite bathrooms recently great breakfast buffet good variety dishes even guest great delight access free wifi connection available guest rooms

Reviews.Title: “Can't Wait to Go Again and Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: byairorsea
Reviews.Content: chose hotel part british package read reviews prior visit happy said hotel great neighbourhood local shops restaurants also close metro rer c line breakfast good selection eggs croissants yogurt etc coffee tea chocolate would liked fresh fruit though rooms small however spent little time bathroom newly renovated closet shelves ample hangers many things see within walking distance hotel area found many interesting shops restaurants along rue de cdg easy get rer c kennedy stop change rer b notre busy times inexpensive way get airport loved paris would return hotel area value money also staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great location, great service”
Reviews.Author: cutecdnchick
Reviews.Content: rooms small normal hotel paris rooms clean staff polite ready help anything need got hotel soon checked receptionist explained needed know advised us best also cheapest way see paris morning went breakfast describe delicious every morning selection fresh cakes home made hotel run family noticed everyone proud job give 100 customers location amazing ten minutes walk reach eiffel tour would reccomend hotel anybody

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place with Good Access”
Reviews.Author: Siavashpolo
Reviews.Content: spent one week husband hotel honeymoon easily say charming points location staff hotel close 4 metro stations could reach eiffel walking 10 minutes staff even welcomed us warm friendly helpful searching ways reach many places rooms smaller expected seen pictures surprised us much paris hotel rooms mentioned small previous outside nearly time rooms bathroom clean result say next possible paris holiday choose eiffel kennedy

Reviews.Title: “Really friendly hotel, very clean and tidy”
Reviews.Author: dee4lifeBath_england
Reviews.Content: honeymoon august 2010 travelled throughout france first stopped paris spent 4 lovely nights eiffel kennedy hotel small private hotel would like come back rooms small clean convenient staff friendly helpful owner whose name bernard nice man spent 20 minutes phone talk local company select plan breakfasts cooked locally wife enjoyed tasty cuisine bakery first didnt realize benefits location spent one night weve done hotel quiet place however close couple metro tube stations line quick metro however called france walk distance tour eiffel travelled paris id definitely come back stop eiffel kennedy

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service and great location!”
Reviews.Author: KNGirlX
Reviews.Content: staff friendly helpful metro 3 blocks away 2 nice little markets street 1 block away well nice little restaurant right next door nice little neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, rooms small but service fantastic”
Reviews.Author: 40Foot
Reviews.Content: stayed september perfect booked hotel wanted separate rooms us booked suite expecting sitting room sofa bedroom much surprise much better section hotel separated rooms door could lock got section two full bathroom privacy yet together would perfect situation family wanted kids separate room still away guest rooms paris weather perfect slept windows wide open paris problem noise also loved little restaurant around corner nightcap night staff terrific helped us sightseeing plans would highly recommend eiffel kennedy

Reviews.Title: “feels like home”
Reviews.Author: piadel
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights small hotel clean rooms polite staffs october outside temperature night hotel heating system didnâ€™t work really spent unforgettable nights cold eiffel tower 30 min walk reaching nearest metro station least 10 min walk free internet access incredible staffs highlights hotel select next visit

Reviews.Title: “Very good choice!”
Reviews.Author: jmcomputergeek
Reviews.Content: stayed eiffelkennedy hotel 5 nights late september early october generally pleased arrived 930 overnight flight delighted find room already available could take short nap setting explore paris staff speaks english quite well willing offer suggestions everything best ways get various tourist attractions restaurants area room though bit small clean quite comfortable neighborhood quiet paris standards plenty restaurants useful small grocery store close could done without construction site window never could get wireless internet work room long usually come downstairs laptop use public computer business center minor complaints start finish eiffel kennedy staff made visit paris pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Great advice from Tripadvisor - This is a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: dst103
Reviews.Content: title says would definitely stay within walking distance metro eiffel tower staff speak useful amount english helpful directions tips arranging shuttle airport requests rooms etc breakfast basement charming food nice one best features cafe right next spent amount time eating drinking soaking corner paris note chain hotel boutique hotel good local

Reviews.Title: “Perfect cosy Paris getaway!”
Reviews.Author: Musalugnt
Reviews.Content: rooms small though expected rooms hotel clean quiet good value bernard helpful planning days traveling daughter son law birthday trip 3 weeks stayed bernard 7 nights close location metro rer several good restaurants area breakfast good meats cheese yogurt 10 euro parking available

Reviews.Title: “Plesant Surprise”
Reviews.Author: llytle
Reviews.Content: bernard staff extend warm welcome nothing much trouble lovely clean well maintained hotel excellent breakfasts cakes die windows well soundproofed good nights sleep guaranteed 5 minutes ranelagh metro rer buses 72 70 get anywhere comfortably island provides lovely evening walk rue great shopping area lots little shops cannot wait visit

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Parisian Style Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jadeylil
Reviews.Content: extremely happy choice room tiny bathroom really clean great hot water shower pressure beds comfortable location great would definitely stay area paris staff super friendly helpful could answer questions great recommendations hotels issues summer would noisy window open noisy construction going next door started around 7 window closed fine weather cool fine wifi great worked two nights five didnt work guy desk didnt know didnt try anything friend adjoining room said neighbors quite noisy night could hear didnt find room didnt hear neighbors breakfast good reasonably priced brasserie right downstairs awesome good salads wine convenient

Reviews.Title: “Quaint hotel”
Reviews.Author: elliemay5
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel greeted friendly owner helpful giving us good local information regard transport eateries well situated number 72 bus take places want go city deal include breakfast would say well worth 10 euro charge rooms service good would use hotel

Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem in Paris”
Reviews.Author: LisburnSam
Reviews.Content: hotel located close eiffel tower close metro station 10 minutes walk 5 minutes away rer station room quite small maintenance issues handled day usually youll evening youre back room staff friendly attentive neighborhood safe nights good sushi place called sushi gourmet close although breakfast 10 euro good start day

Reviews.Title: “It was Great stuff!”
Reviews.Author: HolidayzHolidayz
Reviews.Content: cant say enough treatment received everyone hotel transit strike hit bernard helped group 8 secure private car get us two planned day im sure would done without part daily treatment received everyone friendly helpful would highly recommend hotel rooms clean breakfast fresh since plan visit paris definitely stay location fabulous short walk eiffel tour seine major transportation thanks making amazing trip much better

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and cozy hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Blitzu
Reviews.Content: everything hotel great staff excellent spoke great english room clean service daily bed comfy shower warm powerful enough windows glazed well noises busy streets hotel near metro stop line 9 connecting eiffel tower champs elysees louvre walking distance eiffel tower takes along path middle river lovely walk could praise hotel highly enough would definately recommend anyone stay sent email thanks hotel would definately return oh cafe next door great sit glass wine also great food recommend cheese board meats

Reviews.Content: room positives good size parisian standards great maid service great air conditioning unit good water pressure shower great view window street dont need air conditioning sleep window open able noise cars horns fantastic wireless internet service room ask front desk password negatives windows decent really soundproof walls relatively thin hear running water neighbours staff helpful friendly negatives maid staff absolutely great well clean sheets bathroom daily location best cafe right bottom hotel relatively calm residential area plenty markets right across street plenty metro within five minute walk open market every friday across street seine river two minutes away makes great walk night

Reviews.Title: “Clean,comfortable,friendly - Mike/Janice, New Zealand”
Reviews.Author: maoriontour
Reviews.Content: booked triple room travelling teenage daughter central location good short walk river seine 15 minute walk eiffel tower shopping centre 10 minutes walk away buffet breakfast nice including french cakes reception staff spoke english manager friendly helpful hotel clean free use laptop internet room extremely small three people three single beds pushed together little space around sides beds pillows comfortable worst one month europe trip need new ones thing though room stuffy smelled stale cigarette smoke walls covered fabric wallpaper seemed smell previous asked nonsmoking room thing perhaps rooms smelled better though recently occupied overall enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: AmberG07
Reviews.Content: arrived paris day fantastic arrived hotel little early bernard gave us wonderful welcome asked could lunch recommended cafe la excellent returned hotel room ready beautiful view eiffel tower bags already room lovely gesture room excellent excellent soundproofing airconditioning lovely bathroom also extremely pleasant changed day new towels fantastic bernard simone absolutely lovely even helped us poor french patient attempts nothing problem wonderful really enjoyed area near sights used 72 bus runs right along seine recommended bernard also area found nice shops avenue de lovely cafes great two nights long enough hesitation recommending hotel certainly return

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful French hotel”
Reviews.Author: AdmRep
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel stayed 3 nights staff wonderful breakfast lovely hotel within walking distance tower yes room little small ac flat screen television clean would certainly stay next time paris lovely resturants close recommended hotel staff

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tired_travelling_dad
Reviews.Content: perfect 3 day stay started warm welcome owner gave us map paris tips convenient bus 72 metro train rer c 2 separate rooms connected small corridor could closed locked great set 2 adults 2 children bathroom privacy view tip eiffel tower plus hotel immaculate charming breakfast room basement exceptional variety food mostly baked cooked owners wife hotel high rating trip advisor well offers excellent value money know stay next time come paris

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: We3luv2travel
Reviews.Content: booked triple room long weekend may arrived eurostar took metro hotel 57 min walk metro station pleasant residential streets location quite convenient great bus route passes many tourist spots checkin concierge went smoothly front desk friendly helpful tips advice followed advice dinner recommendation one night great hotel walk eiffel tower lovely stroll good weather room small triple beds fit side side become one big bed comfortable hardly room 3 people put luggage room also sharing one key 3 created hassle even though key left front desk leaving wasnt much bother keycard entry may convenient bathroom large flat screen tv mounted wall overall would recommend hotel price location though triple room definitely small side even european standards

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Fabulous Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Aprl24
Reviews.Content: booked 6 day stay eiffel kennedy hotel two teenage children choose hotel location fact wanted children experience charm smaller hotel neighborhood every respect stayed triple windows opened view eiffel tower even though neighborhood short walk excellent transportation hotel staff gave us wonderful directions kind family neighborhood surrounding hotel provided feast would stop bakery fruit stand purchase supplies many lovely park steps away hotel favorite short hotel eiffel kennedy treasure

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: wizzerd
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel eiffel kennedy two nights pleased keeping mind european hotel rooms quite small shower however kindness staff overwhelming simone quite sure helpful knowledgeable area quick willing help even rented cell phone would work eiffel kennedy amazingly close eiffel tower many paris main attractions nice neighborhood many thanks short wonderful stay would definitely stay hotel visiting paris

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel, extrodinary staff!”
Reviews.Author: Passtraveler
Reviews.Content: known less cordial americans hotel front desk staff spoke english went way give us directions little tips touring even various tourist books etc lobby people use arrived early morning taken overnight train room ready able check room clean comfortable since traveling daughter booked triple room three twin beds coffee shop next door bakery across street market plenty fresh fruit 12 block away room minibar little extra room refrigerator able store fruit husband ate hotel breakfast day cost 10 eu daughter preferred shop neighborhood stores ate much cheaper location good three block walk subway rer train station number 72 bus stops 2 blocks away bus goes right past eiffel tower louvre find newer hotels hotels want great service good value money hotel eiffel kennedy

Reviews.Title: “Typically French”
Reviews.Author: FrettingPete
Reviews.Content: booked weekend break paris chose hotel based reviews site delighted hotel given warm welcome given loads maps travel advice even booked minibus take us airport room new lcd tv bathroom clean breakfast great free wifi pc lobby guests use print even bar next door cafe la lovely even drinks tad pricey seemed par course paris location great plenty restaurants walking distance metro ranelagh line 9 rer kennedy radio france line c eiffel tower also walking distance definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: blath
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews site disappointed would recommend hotel others arrival lady reception gave us map straight away gave us staff met friendly helpful reception staff spoke good english room smallish comfortable reasonable standard 3 star hotel breakfast extra good usual sort european breakfast fare also tasty cakes hotel within 5 mins metro line 9 rer line c 10 mins metro line 6 area lovely residential area quite restaurants several shops far enough away tourist hustle bustle close enough easily get sites

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel”
Reviews.Author: a_stevenson
Reviews.Content: first trip paris parents previous year told us europe different canada fell love hotel eiffel kennedy perfect location walking distance eiffel tower metro trains hotel staff friendly helpful couldnt asked rooms clean hotel ever seen rooms smaller north american hotels didnt care cafe downstairs best cafe want thank simone staff making vacation one best great planning return honeymoon

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here...”
Reviews.Author: Franceens
Reviews.Content: returned weekend hotel eiffelkennedy paris would highly recommend hotel anyone looking good 3 star four us booked two twin rooms located top floor small clean cosy minibar flatscreen tv airconditioning etc breakfast good selection bread croissants meat eggs various sweet cakes seem popular small breakfast room cellar building lots character also found staff hotel friendly helpful lovely little restaurant beside hotel cafã© la serves good variety food drink lots atmosphere also couple nice restaurants area prices reasonable food service excellent quiet area paris appeared mainly residential close two rer stations far eiffel tower walking distance centre paris

Reviews.Title: “Great find in paris in convenient location”
Reviews.Author: Chris_from_CH
Reviews.Content: love hotel small hotel right middle paris near metro station radio kennedy line b reasonable price nice quite neighbourhood staff friendly helpful rooms well heated although bit small breakfast ok bit expensive much choice since went paris christmas day short staff attitude excellent much better higher class hotels recommend friend

Reviews.Title: “"True" Cozy French”
Reviews.Author: orchid4sue
Reviews.Content: hotel clean good location bed bit uncomfortable breakfast front desk people really helpful nice pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Home from Home”
Reviews.Author: kainternational
Reviews.Content: came back trip paris loved little hotel rooms small clean breakfast ok worth 10 euro preferred coffee little nice restaurant right next hotel situation hotel excellent walk eiffel tower 15 minutes also bus took us everywhere staff helpful friendly would recommend hotel short trip paris

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: arch1WashingtonDC
Reviews.Content: beautiful flight canada paris france air canada rather negative experience got eiffel kennedy surprise mr bernard hotel owner really gave us good hand calls cancel credit card card helpful kinds next report gave us directions minute started help us pressure came wonderful experience hotel always help us suggest nice little cafã© especially cafã© one next door cafã© la wonderful concierge customers matter fact staff helpful polite patient breakfast also good french petit great breakfast maker prompt service always smile helpful comment planning day breakfast dining room typical charming room nicely decorated charming bathroom good size always clean simone front desk helpful help wonderful stay hotel wonderful stay hotel eiffel kennedy location also nice pleased services would recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Stay Here, it's great!”
Reviews.Author: jlschlesi
Reviews.Content: booked four night stay paris family arrived late thursday night recieved warm welcome yes rooms small surprise bearing mind price hardly spent time bedroom mind wonderful aspect hotel friendly staff everyone smile impressed breakfast started day really well pleasantly impressed change linen sheets towels changed everyday expectations three star hotel looking great location 20 minutes walk river taxi relaxed way explore city warm welcome great breakfast cannot go far wrong booking lovely hotel shall certainly returning thank

Reviews.Title: “A charming little hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: viaggiera
Reviews.Content: eiffel kennedy nice place stay owner lovely wife make feel right home close metro located within walking distance eiffel tower stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful and comfortable, made the break special.”
Reviews.Author: PinguLondon
Reviews.Content: traveling two teenagers needing triple room worried booked caused limited selection hotels price range concern thrilled aspects stay eiffelkennedy first bernard simone gracious sensitive responsive helpful put us ease gave us terrific tips assistance whether directions eating establishments anything secondly gourmet breakfasts often family special cakes pastries well generous provided great start days location short walk metros bus taxi stand reasonably priced delicious local restaurants stayed 9 nights clean thorough room sound proof promised hot water never ran location safe beds comfortable elevator useful especially bags end trip hotel great value cost experience mind five stars ill recommending everyone well back
